item.title: Why is Vishwas Agri Seeds Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 13-Jan, Vishwas Agri Seeds Ltd witnessed a notable rise in its share price, climbing 8.15% to ₹43.80 by 09:15 PM, outperforming its sector and broader market indices despite a challenging longer-term performance backdrop. Time: 11 hours ago

item.title: Why is Vikram Aroma Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 13-Jan, Vikram Aroma Ltd’s stock price fell by 3.15% to close at ₹70.04, reflecting ongoing concerns about the company’s financial health and market performance despite an initially positive start to the trading day. Time: 11 hours ago

item.title: Why is AWFIS Space Solutions Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 13-Jan, AWFIS Space Solutions Ltd witnessed a notable decline in its share price, continuing a sustained downward trajectory that has seen the stock underperform both its sector and the broader market benchmarks. Time: 11 hours ago

item.title: Why is Italian Edibles Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 13-Jan, Italian Edibles Ltd witnessed a significant drop in its share price, falling by 7.17% to close at ₹27.85. This decline reflects a continuation of the stock's underperformance relative to key benchmarks and technical indicators, signalling persistent challenges for the company’s equity in the current market environment. Time: 11 hours ago

item.title: Why is Jasch Gauging Technologies Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 13-Jan, Jasch Gauging Technologies Ltd witnessed a notable decline in its share price, falling 4.16% to close at ₹533.10. This drop reflects a continuation of recent negative momentum, with the stock underperforming both its sector and the broader market benchmarks. Time: 11 hours ago
